IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_glider_durability') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_glider_durability GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_glider_durability @id dbo.id_t, @durability INT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE Glider_infos SET durability = @durability WHERE id = @id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
